text: niccayamaka, nirakarippavarkal tankal porulkalai (makkal) allahvutaiya valiyil celvatait tatai ceyya celavu ceykinranar. Avarkal melum, ivvare celavu ceyvarkal, mutivil atu avarkalukke tukkamaka erpattuvitum! Pinnar avarkal torkatikkappattu verri kollappatuvarkal. (Ippatippatta) nirakarippavarkal (marumaiyil) narakattin pakkame ottic cellappatuvarkal
